Header.Name: Inovis
Header.Suggestion: If the customer is already set up on the True Commerce Trading Profile, add a note "Customer set up with Inovis" in the VAN Setup task and mark it as completed.

ScribTemplate.Template: PSN: [$:PSN][$$:BR]Area: Technical Support[$$:BR]Sub-Area: Client Applications[$$:BR]Severity: Medium[$$:BR][$$:BR]Subject: Assign EDI ID [$:CUSTOMER_QUALIFIER]/[$:CUSTOMER_EDI_ID] to BizManager Party - WebMethods[$$:BR][$$:BR]Description: Please confirm this ID [$:CUSTOMER_QUALIFIER]/[$:CUSTOMER_EDI_ID] belongs to PSN: [$:PSN] and add this ID to our TrueCommerce WebMethods party on BizManager.
